content: Delivered project, backgroundwhat, spiritual-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
original:
Improve this resume bullet:
""Project BackgroundWhat is spiritual innovation? How do spiritual innovators in the 21st century interpret and iterate on ancient wisdom to meet contemporary and future challenges? How can such evolving wisdom be made accessible to all who seek it in an increasingly global, religiously pluralistic, digital world?Following more than a year of research, Sacred Design Lab is producing a public-facing report on spiritual innovation worldwide. The project is funded by the Templeton World Charity Foundation, which supports innovations that contribute to human flourishing. You can learn more about the project at this link. The audience for the report is spiritual innovators, religious leaders and institutions, funders, investors, and other potential partners looking to support spiritual innovation.Sacred Design Lab’s founding members were trained at Harvard Divinity School and have spent a decade working to map and understand the spiritual landscape in the United States, with a particular focus on supporting innovators. This is the first time we have expanded our research globally and we are eager to include artwork that reflects the spiritual lives of people around the world.Request for ProposalsWe are seeking illustrations for a public-facing report on global spiritual innovation, which will most likely take the form of a PDF document housed on Sacred Design Lab’s website. We define spiritual innovation as “A novel way to address spiritual longings that leads to flourishing people and planet.”We plan to commission six illustrations from artists in six different parts of the world on this theme. The design guidelines for your illustration are as follows:For the content of your illustration, respond to the question: What does spiritual innovation mean to you?Consider: Relationship between past and future, ancient wisdom and emergent technologies, religious traditions and lineage, creativity and possibility, soul needs of the present and futureIllustrations should be detailed, multi-faceted, and represent the individual illustrator’s style and point of view, while taking into consideration any art direction provided in terms of color, style, and sizing.We encourage you to draw on themes based on your personal experience and your own cultural and / or religious context.Approach/StyleHere are two previous reports by Sacred Design Lab for an idea of past approaches to the work: project 1, project 2. Some descriptive words for this project: Welcoming, soulful, spacious, expert but non-academic, some iconography, non-corporate, pathos not cutesy.Candidate QualificationsExperience creating professional quality illustrations.Must live in or have deep familiarity with a culture within one of the following regionsAsiaLatin AmericaAfricaEuropeMiddle EastOceaniaStrong communication, organizational, and time-management skills.Kind, collaborative, able to work independently.Proposal RequirementsIn an email or document please provide:Examples of your illustration work, ideally in context of a report or other written materialsResumeParagraph and sketch describing your proposed illustrationTimelineWe will select illustrators, one from each of six regions, for this project by February 19, 2024. Upon selection, each illustrator will be provided with art direction and any additional context. Illustrators are to submit their piece by March 1, 2024. Any feedback will be delivered to the illustrators within 5 business days. Final illustration and file hand-off will be due by mid-March, 2024.Budget and logisticsBudget for the project is a flat rate of $350 per illustration.To process your honorarium if outside the US, we will request a W8-BEN form, outgoing wire form, and bank authorization (if inside the US, W-9 form and ACH info)Selected illustrators will have their name, one-line bio, and website/social link included in the final report alongside their illustration.Budget: $350Posted On: February 15, 2024 21:34 UTCCategory: IllustrationSkills:IllustrationSkills: IllustrationCountry: United States""

""Resumen del ProyectoEstamos buscando un freelancer calificado con experiencia en levantamiento topográfico, diseño arquitectónico y modelado de paisajismo para desarrollar un plan integral para un terreno de 11,000 m² ubicado en Bahía Drake, a 3 km de la costa, con vistas al mar y rodeado de vegetación. El terreno tiene elevación y pendientes pronunciadas, lo que requiere una consideración cuidadosa en el proceso de planificación.Requisitos EspecíficosLevantamiento Topográfico:- Objetivo: Realizar un levantamiento topográfico detallado del terreno para identificar contornos de elevación, características naturales y artificiales.- Detalles del Terreno:- Tamaño: 11,000 m²- Características: Pocos árboles, un jardín existente, pequeñas áreas de bosque, límites, un camino de acceso, jardín, cercas, 5 domos geodésicos y un restaurante.- Elevación y Pendientes: Se espera que el freelancer encuentre los contornos de elevación correctos debido a las pronunciadas pendientes del terreno.Detalles Arquitectónicos y de Paisajismo:- Construcciones Actuales:- Restaurante: Dimensiones aproximadas de 11.3 m x 13 m. Las medidas específicas se definirán en colaboración con el freelancer, a quien se le proporcionará un dibujo básico o archivo AutoCAD para orientación inicial.- Domos Geodésicos: 6 metros de diámetro cada uno, con una cubierta adyacente de 7 x 3 metros y una cubierta de restaurante de 2.5 x 6 metros fuera de la circunferencia del domo.- **Modelado de Paisajismo y Construcción**:- Inicialmente, el freelancer creará un plan básico en SketchUp, lo que nos permitirá agregar ideas preliminares de paisajismo. El modelado detallado de paisajismo y la representación de construcción serán un esfuerzo colaborativo para finalizar los detalles.Entregables1. Renderizaciones: Modelado y representación final de paisajismo y construcción, incorporando comentarios y requisitos específicos.Colaboración y Comunicación- El freelancer seleccionado trabajará en estrecha colaboración con nosotros para refinar y detallar las medidas de las construcciones existentes y para incorporar ideas de paisajismo y construcción en el plan final.- Se requieren actualizaciones y comunicación regulares a través de [método/plataforma específica de comunicación], asegurando la alineación con los objetivos del proyecto y ajustes oportunos según sea necesario.Presentación de PropuestasLos candidatos interesados deben enviar una propuesta que incluya:- Experiencia previa con proyectos similares.- Portafolio de trabajo relevante.- Enfoque para este proyecto, incluyendo pensamientos iniciales sobre el manejo de elevaciones y pendientes pronunciadas.- Cronograma estimado y presupuesto.Criterios de Selección- Experiencia en planificación de terrenos en entornos desafiantes.- Competencia en AutoCAD y SketchUp.- Enfoque creativo y colaborativo para el diseño arquitectónico y de paisajismo.- Capacidad para trabajar dentro de los plazos especificados y comunicar activamente el progreso.Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00Posted On: February 18, 2024 04:21 UTCCategory: Landscape ArchitectureSkills:Landscape Master Planning, Architecture Consultation, 2D Design, Recreational Architecture, Castilian SpanishSkills: Landscape Master Planning, Architecture Consultation, 2D Design, Recreational Architecture, Castilian SpanishCountry: Costa Rica""

content: Delivered audiobook, mirth, the-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
original:
Improve this resume bullet:
""Audiobook, Mirth Is The Best Medicine, currently listed on Amazon in print and Kindle. It is about 120 pages.The narrator/ author is Mirth who acts as a alter ego for the author David Goodemote.Mirth is best known as an immediate, involuntary emotional response to a joke, sarcasm, or witticism. Even though spontaneity has been a hallmark of Mirth for centuries, Mirth is much more – he is the embodiment of devil-may-care, not concerned with the consequences of ignoring accepted conventional thought and behavior.Where medicine is involved, whenever Mirth has been needed, he has been by David’s side.While Mirth’s intervention has helped David through the potential difficulties of facing tough medical problems, it undoubtedly also contributed to a lack of caution to the point of fostering feelings of near invincibility on David’s part.Mirth did such a good job of patterning David’s health life to be not unlike that exhibited by Dorian Gray, that David often transported himself to a state of timeless disregard for his well-being.Cheerfulness is a habit, while Mirth is an unannounced flash of amusement. While David can enjoy the former, he cherishes the latter. That is why Mirth was selected as his mentor very early in his life.When David meets a new medical practitioner, the usual comment by that person is something like, “Reading your chart, I didn’t expect you to look so good.” David’s response is, “My chart seems like I should be taking my last breath, doesn’t it?”Mirth has written this book based on his own observations and the counsel he provided to David over time. David also provided his own uncompromising views for consideration by Mirth for possible content.I need someone who has produced an audiobook for Audible including voice, editing, and successful submission. You will need to use your own studio. A PDF of the book is attached.Hourly Range: $22.00-$50.00Posted On: February 19, 2024 23:40 UTCCategory: Voice TalentSkills:Female, Voice-Over, English, Middle-Aged Adult, AudiobookSkills: Female, Voice-Over, English, Middle-Aged Adult, AudiobookLocation Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.Country: United States""

""Competitive pay, investment in you and your career to help you earn even higher pay and more senior roles, and potential immigration to our countries of office. Sound good? Read on.We believe in a lot of things. Moving daily. Flossing (the thread kind). Having dance parties. Above all, we believe in self-empowerment, positive inner-development and living a life of possibility. A career with us is more than what you do today; it’s what you’re going to do tomorrow.Who We Are:We as an organization exist because America is critically divided, socially and economically, holding everyone back.Our vision is an America moving forward together, united around a common health, opportunity, and dignity.Our work starts in the least resourced neighbourhoods of rural America, where our leaders and constituents have overcome the deepest poverty, racism, and educational gaps in America, with much less assistance than what’s available in urban America.Our boards and leadership are diverse in experience, viewpoint, and identity, and united in respect and vision. Board members joined us out of alignment and trust, and are not paid. ""Description:We seek a highly skilled Python developer with expertise in web scraping, specifically using the Scrapy framework, for a comprehensive Reddit data-gathering project. This project involves creating a sophisticated tool to scrape Reddit posts and their associated comments from various subreddits without utilizing Reddit's API.Key Responsibilities:Subreddit Listing:Develop a system that takes a list of specific subreddits.The tool should handle multiple subreddits in one operation efficiently.Crawling Reddit Posts and Comments:Crawl the specified subreddits to collect data on individual posts and their associated comments.The crawler must efficiently handle large datasets.Scraping Post and Comment Data:Extract detailed content and metadata from each post and its comments.See the example.jsonl file to see how the JSONL file should look for Reddit posts.In the example.jsonl file, each line is a JSON object representing a Reddit post. The structure includes:• post_id: Unique identifier of the post.• subreddit: Subreddit the post belongs to.• title: Title of the post.• url: URL of the post.• timestamp: Timestamp of when the post was created.• author: Username of the post's author.• upvotes: Number of upvotes the post has received.• downvotes: Number of downvotes the post has received.• num_comments: Number of comments on the post.• flair: Category or flair of the post.• content: Text content of the post.• comments: An array of comments, where each comment is a JSON object containing:• comment_id: Unique identifier of the comment.• author: Username of the comment's author.• timestamp: Timestamp of when the comment was created.• content: Text content of the comment.• upvotes: Number of upvotes the comment has received.• downvotes: Number of downvotes the comment has received.Ensure accuracy and integrity in the scraped data.Data Output and Management:Organize the scraped data into a well-structured JSONL ([REDACTED_URL] file, with separate sections or files for posts and comments.Ensure clarity and consistency in data formatting.Please see the attached example.jsonl file for the required output.Required Skills:Proven expertise in Python and extensive experience with the Scrapy package.Strong background in web scraping and data extraction without relying on specific APIs.Ability to manage large datasets and complex scraping tasks.Keen attention to detail and commitment to data accuracy.Professional service with proven communication skills.Demonstrated track record of timely and successful project delivery.Project Delivery:Provide an estimated timeline for project completion. ""RFP: Development of C Library for ESP32 for a USB Composite HID Device with a Serial Terminal Interface1. Project Overview:The purpose of this project is to develop a C library for ESP32 that provides a USB Composite Human Interface Device (HID) with a serial terminal interface. This library will be used to facilitate communication between ESP32 and other devices through a USB interface.Primary Hardware:Microcontroller: ESP32­-PICO-­MINI-­02USB to Serial Adaptor: CP2104-F03-GM2. Scope of Work:The selected developer will be expected to:- Develop a C library for ESP32 that supports a USB Composite HID Device.- Implement a serial terminal interface to facilitate communication.- Test the library to ensure it works as expected with ESP32 and the USB HID Device.- Provide documentation for the library, including how to install, use, and troubleshoot it.3. Project Timeline:The project will commence immediately upon selection of the successful candidate and is expected to be completed within 4 weeks.4. Budget:The budget for this project is $1500. This includes the development, testing, and documentation of the C library.5. Technology Architecture:The key components of the technology architecture include:- ESP32: This is the microcontroller that will be used for this project. It will be connected to the USB HID device through the C library.- C Programming Language: The library will be developed using the C programming language.- USB Composite HID Device: This will be connected to the ESP32 through the C library. It will be used to test the functionality of the library.- Serial Terminal Interface: This will be implemented in the C library to facilitate communication between the ESP32 and the USB HID device.6. Proposal Submission:Interested candidates should submit their proposal, including their experience, approach to the project, and estimated timeline, by February 23, 2024.7. Evaluation Criteria:Proposals will be evaluated based on:- Relevant experience and skills in C programming and ESP32.- Understanding of the project requirements.- Proposed approach to the project.- Ability to deliver within the specified timeline and budget.8. Improve this resume bullet:
""Description:We are looking for an experienced developer to build an API that enriches contact information by fetching additional details based on the provided email id, company name, first name, and last name. The primary goal is to fill in any missing information by searching Google, Bing, and specifically looking for:1. LinkedIn profile2. Their company domain3. Their company nameKey Requirements:Input: The API should accept a dictionary as input, with the email id being the only mandatory field. I am sending my website and announcements to elementary schools and children's theaters in the U.S. and Canada. BNM can be performed BY kids as a full show, or scene by scene over time, and presented at weekly meetings, or by children's theaters. It can also be performed FOR children by older students and adults. The person who set it up was wonderful and worked with me for over a year. Can I keep the 75,000 for the future in the Mailchimp archive, but only pay and use a smaller number? Bully No More! is sponsored by the non-profit Bully No More Foundation Ltd. This can be a part-time, ongoing job as I want to continue sending out mailchimps. It is very important that we Zoom, at least once a week, to avoid continuous emails. A lot is accomplished with back-and-forth live communication. ""Summary (TL/DR): mum bought an Atlanta house (as a canadian resident) added me to the house name via quitclaim in 2011 (either not both) and sold it in 2021. I created an LLC, transferred our ownership to the LLC partnership to allow us sell remotely but hadn't paid the taxes because the realtors only wanted to use only the sale price to calculate the taxes instead of all the costs and losses over the years. Unfortunately, many accountants said they’ve not dealt with a foreign owner and that is why I couldn't find an accountantLonger versionMy mum Laura bought a house in Atlanta in 2009 for approximately 95kIn January 2011Mrs Laura told me that she wanted to add my name just in case of any unforeseen event. She then did a quitclaim deed at the us embassy and a lawyer filed it in Jan 2011After many repairs and fixtures the house was eventually rented out around 2014.While many tenants gave headaches and eventually had to leave resulting in losses, the house got one long term tenant towards the end. All this time no taxes were filed. My mum told me around 2014 that she wanted me to have the house and that she won’t have any interest in it. In 2020 I decided it’s better to sell the house but was told it could not be sold as is. I fixed it and created an LLC and transferred ownership to the LLC (partnership) to enable the sale. In essence, even though her name was on the LLC when it was sold I will be the person to pay her taxes. But no matter the calculation, She already indicated that she was going to give me as far back as 2014 causing an added complication between when she indicated she would give me and the best time to effect this transfer due to the decline in property value([REDACTED_PHONE]) and losses from tenants.A few months later in March 2021, I bought a bungalow in ESL (east st. louis), Illinois for 33k and fixed many things in it but could not rent it till save for one person in March 2023- June 2023.
